get.description: Creates the payload for a new tokens issuance with crowdsale.

parameters.name: ecosystem
parameters.description: (string, required) the ecosystem to create the tokens in, must be 1

parameters.name: propertyPricision
parameters.description: (number, required) the pricision of the tokens to create:[0, 8]

parameters.name: previousId
parameters.description: (number, required) an identifier of a predecessor token (0 for new crowdsales)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: (string, required) a category for the new tokens (can be '')

parameters.name: subcategory
parameters.description: (string, required) a subcategory for the new tokens  (can be '')

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: (string, required) the name of the new tokens to create

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: (string, required) an URL for further information about the new tokens (can be '')

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: (string, required) a description for the new tokens (can be '')
parameters.example: (number, required) the identifier of a token eligible to participate in the crowdsale

parameters.name: propertyIdDesired
parameters.description: tokensPerUnit
parameters.example: (string, required) the amount of tokens granted per unit invested in the crowdsale

parameters.name: deadline
parameters.description: (number, required) the deadline of the crowdsale as Unix timestamp

parameters.name: deadline
parameters.description: (number, required) the deadline of the crowdsale as Unix timestamp

parameters.name: earlyBonus
parameters.description: (number, required) an early bird bonus for participants in percent per week

parameters.name: undefine
parameters.description: (number, required) the value must be 0

parameters.name: totalNumber
parameters.description: (string, required) the number of tokens to create

get.description: Create and broadcast a participate crowsale transaction.

parameters.name: fromAddress
parameters.description: (string, required) the address to send from

parameters.name: toAddress
parameters.description: (string, required) the address of the receiver

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: (string, required) the amount of WHC to participate crowsale

parameters.name: redeemAddress
parameters.description: (string, optional) an address that can spend the transaction dust (sender by default)

parameters.name: referenceAmount
parameters.description: (string, optional) a bitcoin amount that is sent to the receiver (minimal by default)

get.description: Create and broadcast a simple send transaction.

parameters.description: (string, required) the address to send from

parameters.description: (number, required) the identifier of the tokens to send

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: (string, required) the amount to send

parameters.name: redeemAddress
parameters.description: (string, optional) an address that can spend the transaction dust (sender by default)

parameters.name: referenceAmount
parameters.description: (string, optional) a bitcoin amount that is sent to the receiver (minimal by default)

get.description: Transfers all available tokens in the given ecosystem to the recipient.

parameters.description: (string, required) the address to send from

parameters.name: toAddress
parameters.description: (string, required) the address of the receiver

parameters.name: ecosystem
parameters.description: (number, required) the ecosystem of the tokens to send (1 for main ecosystem, 2 for test ecosystem)

parameters.name: redeemAddress
parameters.description: (string, optional) an address that can spend the transaction dust (sender by default)

parameters.name: referenceAmount
parameters.description: (string, optional) a bitcoin amount that is sent to the receiver (minimal by default)

get.description: Issue or grant new units of managed tokens.

parameters.name: fromAddress
parameters.description: (string, required) the address to send from

parameters.name: fromAddress
parameters.description: (string, required) the receiver of the tokens (sender by default, can be '')

parameters.name: propertyId
parameters.description: (number, required) the identifier of the tokens to grant

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: (string, required) the amount of tokens to create

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: (string, optional) a text note attached to this transaction (none by default)

get.description: Create new tokens as crowdsale.

parameters.name: fromAddress
parameters.description: (string, required) the address to send from

parameters.name: ecosystem
parameters.description: (string, required) the ecosystem to create the tokens in, must be 1

parameters.name: propertyPricision
parameters.description: (number, required) the pricision of the tokens to create:[0, 8]

parameters.name: previousId
parameters.description: (number, required) an identifier of a predecessor token (0 for new crowdsales)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: (string, required) a category for the new tokens (can be '')

parameters.name: subcategory
parameters.description: (string, required) a subcategory for the new tokens  (can be '')

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: (string, required) the name of the new tokens to create

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: (string, required) an URL for further information about the new tokens (can be '')

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: (string, required) a description for the new tokens (can be '')

parameters.name: propertyIdDesired
parameters.description: (number, required) the identifier of a token eligible to participate in the crowdsale

parameters.name: tokensPerUnit
parameters.description: (string, required) the amount of tokens granted per unit invested in the crowdsale

parameters.name: deadline
parameters.description: (number, required) the deadline of the crowdsale as Unix timestamp

parameters.name: earlyBonus
parameters.description: (number, required) an early bird bonus for participants in percent per week

parameters.name: undefine
parameters.description: (number, required) the value must be 0

parameters.name: totalNumber
parameters.description: (string, required) the number of tokens to create

get.description: Broadcasts a raw Omni Layer transaction.
